education.title: Education Background

continuousLearning.title: Continuous Learning
continuousLearning.description: My educational background in mathematical sciences provides a strong foundation for data architecture. I continuously stay updated with the latest technologies and methodologies through professional certifications, industry conferences, and hands-on project experience.

aims-masters-bigdata.degree: Cooperative Master in Mathematical Sciences - Big Data specialization
aims-masters-bigdata.description: Cooperative master's program specialized in Big Data technologies, statistical analysis and machine learning. Industrial projects focused on data architecture, analytics and real-world applications of mathematical sciences in data engineering.

ucad-masters-applied.description: Advanced studies in applied mathematics with focus on mathematical modeling, statistical analysis and computational methods. Specialization in optimization theory, numerical analysis and mathematical applications in data science.

ucad-bachelors.description: Foundation in mathematical sciences, statistics and analytical thinking. Focus on mathematical modeling, calculus, linear algebra and probability theory which provides a solid analytical base for data science and engineering.

certifications.title: Certifications & Credentials
certifications.subtitle: Professional certifications that validate my technical expertise and commitment to continuous learning.

work.title: Selected Projects
work.subtitle: Enterprise transformations that deliver measurable impact

sopra-steria.description: Leading a team within the Data Center of Excellence across 8+ client sectors including Banking, Insurance, and Telecom.
sopra-steria.impact: Multi-cloud architecture • TB+ data processing • Cross-industry compliance

bnc.description: Led team of 7 engineers building robust analytical pipelines with innovative PySpark QA frameworks.
bnc.impact: 30% error reduction • 25% efficiency improvement • 40% faster testing

onepoint.description: Delivered technical, organizational, and governance audits for enterprise data platforms across Canada and France. Designed modern, scalable architectures for Fortune 500 companies.
onepoint.impact: Fortune 500 clients • DataOps automation • Security compliance • Performance optimization

orange-ivory.description: Led zero-downtime migration of data workflows to new Hadoop cluster. Developed productivity tools and orchestrated complex data pipelines.
orange-ivory.impact: Zero-downtime migration • 20% productivity improvement • Spark2 upgrade • Oozie orchestration

orange-senegal.description: Developed ML models for customer experience management and QoE prediction.
orange-senegal.impact: 15% customer satisfaction improvement • 30% processing time reduction
